name: Drop vs Planties
description:
Little drop was torn away from its cute pond. Will little drop be able to go back home? Or will little drop get drunk by planties during its journey?

This is a roguelike game with a procedural generated level and the goal is to find and defeat the boss.

Overhelmed by emotions, little drop gets unstable: it is in a solid, liquid and gas states in the same time.

Little drop can temporarily transform into one state to get a special power:

  • Solid (left shift): little drop becomes an ice cube which slips into the direction of the mouse cursor and do medium damage but get a buff in resistance.
  • Liquid (E): little drop becomes a drop! It can do a strong water attack using left mouse button.
  • Gas (space bar): little drop becomes steam, it can shoot weak hot projectiles from a long distance, and suffers more damage.
Controls
  • WASD: move the character
  • Mouse: aim and shoot (left click)
  • left shift | E | space bar: transform into solid | liquid | gas
Softwares
  • Unity & Visual Studio
  • Krita
  • Tracktion Waveform & Audacity
Credits
